Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by New York (N) in 2013...
Traded from New York (N) to New York (A) on 2/4/2014 (Going to NYN: P E. Butler. Going to NYA: 1B C. Herrera)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Kurt Ainsworth (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2014, off Max Scherzer (TB)...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 4/7/2016...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 4/9/2016...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Houston on 7/20/2017...
Injured on 6/27/2018 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 5/29/2019...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 6 runs on 4/20/2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 5/20/2021...
